channel.title: About the Recruitment and Bounty category
channel.description:
Can't get enough Bitbay? Then consider working for us and earning some! Find out here what full time or part time jobs are available; as well as what bounties are on offer more ad-hoc work. Hours are flexible if part time so you can work remotely in your free time and bag yourself some $bay!
**Please ensure you include a covernote and your CV/Linkedin page showing areas of relevance to the positions you are applying for.**
For details positions available please comment against them or email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.
